## Diamonds - Price vs Carat + Clarity

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(caret)
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(plotly))
diamonds <- diamonds[sample(dim(diamonds)[1],size=dim(diamonds)[1]/10),]
g1 <- ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price, col = clarity)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
ggplotly(g1)
```
